text: Richard Movitz (December 10, 1925 - May 13, 2010) was an American alpine skier. He competed in the men's downhill at the 1948 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2010 deaths Category:American male alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of the United States Category:Alpine skiers at the 1948 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Salt Lake City
title: Richard Movitz
